page.title: 13MEDIA - A SURVEY
page.content:
We issued a suvey to the first year class (Juniors) and received 2l returns. We found the following results:- Telephone l3 had one telephone 3 had two telephones l had three telephones Television l8 had one television (colour) 3 had two televisions Television 12 had one television (black & white) 2 had two televisions Videos 9 had one video l had two videos Computers 10 had one computer l had two computers Radios 17 had one radio 2 had two radios 2 had three radios
by pupils from AYLOFF SCHOOL
